quoteFirst: At 5.30 P.M. the sound of gunfire was plainly heard to the south-westward, and the _Chester_ turned in that direction to investigate, and, at
quoteLast: , sighted a three-funnelled light cruiser on the starboard bow, with one or two destroyers in company. The _Chester_ challenged and, receiving no reply, altered course to west to close, judging from the appearance of the destroyer that the vessel was hostile.
title: The Grand Fleet, 1914-1916
author: Jellicoe, John Rushworth, 1859-1935

quoteFirst: _Market_, Tuesday.--_Fairs_, April 7, for horses, cows, and sheep; July 18, holyday; September 19, for horses, cows, and cheese; December 4, for horses and fat cattle.--_Mail_ arrives 8.41 A.M.; departs
quoteLast: --_Inns_, Red Lion, and Three Tuns.--_Bankers_, W.
title:
Curiosities of Great Britain: England and Wales Delineated Vol.1-11
Historical, Entertaining & Commercial; Alphabetically Arranged. 11 Volume set.
author: Dugdale, Thomas; Burnett, William [Other]
